Classes in polimi.reds used by polimi.reds
DispatchingService
          The client interface to access the REDS event service.
Filter
          A REDS filter.
Message
          A REDS message.
MessageID
          It represents the Universal Unique ID of a message.
NodeDescriptor
          The descriptor of a REDS node (i.e., a broker or a client).
Replies
          This class represents a set of replies to a published message.
ReplyTimeoutException
          This exception is thrown when the timeout expires and someone is waiting for a reply.
